short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows unread article count from Digg Reader

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The best way to enjoy your daily news!

-= Features =-
★ Unread news count
★ Easily visit Digg Reader
★ Everything is encrypted, for your safety
★ Desktop notifications (optional)
★ Active support

-= Disclaimer =-
This is an unofficial extension, it is not to be confused as an official product of www.digg.com
